name: ATV Impossible Track City
description:
ATV Impossible Track City is a new superb and advanced driving simulator with top physics engine where you can simulate real extreme racing and compete for the best quad bike driver. Environment has set thrilling impossible simulator for stunts rider to show their skills of stunts racing with atv bike wheeling challenges and bike balance missions in impossible paths. 4x4 bike is placed on top of sky for showing whole world the greatest impossible sky rider. Control your bike with high speedy racing and performing 100% impossible stunts, with smooth controls and easy gameplay where you can learn how to ride in sky drive game.
Features:
- The newest sky road experience real 4x4 bikes
- Day and night beautiful environment for amazing gameplay
- Full range of 4x4 atv quad for impossible tracks stunt rider
- Missions to become ultimate stunt master.
- Smooth control for sky rider stunts
- High Quality graphics
- Peaceful background sound.
